roleset.name: hamper, (as if) by tying the legs/feet together
roleset.note: HOGTIE-V NOTES: Added by Julia for EWT.

example.name: hogtie-v
example.text: On the other , restrictions should be lifted on the mainstream Muslim League - N and Pakistan People 's Party , who-1 can defeat the MMA in fair elections if not hogtied *T*-1 by the secret police .
